document.full_text: the hotel maid whom dominique strauss-kahn is accused of sexually assaulting has added two attorneys to her legal team as she considers a possible civil action, the attorney already representing her said.
document.title: maid in strauss-kahn case considers civil action
lines_and_colors: the hotel maid whom dominique strauss-kahn is accused of sexually assaulting has added two attorneys to her legal team as she considers a possible civil action, the attorney already representing her said.
